text: A new version of the EKS addon 'aws-ebs-csi-driver' is now available.  A merge request with this upgrade applied has been automatically created in the <https://gitlab.smce.nasa.gov/heliocloud/platform}|HelioCloud Platform> repository and is ready for inspection.  The <https://gitlab.smce.nasa.gov/heliocloud/platform/-/merge_requests|Merge Request> corresponding to this change still needs to be merged (or removed if necessary).   ${COMMON_FOOTER}
